document.heading: District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1984

history.narrative: Law 5-113, the “District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1984,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-370, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 26, 1984, and July 10, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 13, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-164 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
